title: Will the PROJECT skins launch in a bundle?
body: I'm thinking about getting all of them but not sure how much the bundle would cost. Do you guys think it would be half price?

replies.body:
i wish that they will make it available so that i can get it :(
{{champion:238}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:236}}

I certainly hope so because otherwise I'm looking at 10,930 RP just to get the set...

Putting that into perspective:
For a person who doesn't own any of the champions (and assuming they already have Project: Yasuo), that's shy of 100 AUD worth of RP right off the bat, a total of 11,190 RP, leaving just 910 RP to use. If they didn't have Yasuo (975 RP) or the Project Yasuo skin (1350 RP) they'd ***HAVE*** to make another purchase of RP to complete the set (assuming they don't have RP already sitting in their account).

Lucky for me I already have Yasuo (and the Project: Yasuo skin) as well as Master Yi, saving me 2,585 RP, and 12,752 IP that could get me Lucian and Zed (both worth 975 RP or 6,300 IP) and save me an additional 1,950 RP, leaving the total RP cost at 8,980 RP. With a bundle that comes down even more significantly.

Slightly more on-topic, it's unlikely Riot wont do a bundle. Bundles are where Riot really makes money because, for a lot of people, it's something they wouldn't normally buy but because it's a bit cheaper they think "oh, I could "save" money by buying the bundle" even though they had no intentions to buy any of it in the first place.
what if i had all the champs? (Zed, Lucian, Fiora, Yasuo, Master yi) what will the price be then?
Assuming you own all champs, but none of this skins, you're looking at 8,570 RP, just shy of what I'm looking at if I use my IP.

Usually a bundle is at best ~25% off (exceptions apply of course) i say ~25% because usually they drop a skin cost (1350 drop to 975)

There will most likely be a bundle, the biggest question would be if Yasuo would actually be included in said bundle.

I doubt it will be half price, id say that if they do a bundle they'll give them to us for 975 for each of zed leo fiora lucian and 1350 for yi in a bundle.
that'll be my guess plus the ward skin and hopefully an icon
and out of the bundle it'll be 1350 for zed leo etc and 1820 for YI
(just my guess)
